name: Ext.grid.filters.filter.Date
doc:
The date grid filter allows you to create a filter selection that limits results to values matching specific date constraints. The filter can be set programmatically or via user input with a configurable DatePicker menu in the filter section of the column header.

Example Date Filter Usage:

var shows = Ext.create('Ext.data.Store', {
    fields: ['id','show', {
          name: 'airDate',
          type: 'date',
          dateFormat: 'Y-m-d'
    }],
    data: [
        {id: 0, show: 'Battlestar Galactica', airDate: '1978-09-17'},
        {id: 1, show: 'Doctor Who', airDate: '1963-11-23'},
        {id: 2, show: 'Farscape', airDate: '1999-03-19'},
        {id: 3, show: 'Firefly', airDate: '2002-12-20'},
        {id: 4, show: 'Star Trek', airDate: '1966-09-08'},
        {id: 5, show: 'Star Wars: Christmas Special', airDate: '1978-11-17'}
    ]
});

Ext.create('Ext.grid.Panel', {
    renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
    title: 'Sci-Fi Television',
    height: 250,
    width: 375,
    store: shows,
    plugins: 'gridfilters',
    columns: [{
        dataIndex: 'id',
        text: 'ID',
        width: 50
    },{
        dataIndex: 'show',
        text: 'Show',
        flex: 1                  
    },{
        xtype: 'datecolumn',
        dataIndex: 'airDate',
        text: 'Original Air Date',
        width: 125,
        filter: {
            type: 'date',

            // optional picker config
            pickerDefaults: {
                // any DatePicker configs
            } 
        }
    }]
});

members.name: active
members.doc: Indicates the initial status of the filter (defaults to false).
members.short_doc: Indicates the initial status of the filter (defaults to false). ...

members.name: dataIndex
members.doc: The Ext.data.Store dataIndex of the field this filter represents. The dataIndex does not actually have to exist in the store.
members.short_doc: The Ext.data.Store dataIndex of the field this filter represents. ...

members.name: dateFormat
members.doc: The date format to return when using getValue. Defaults to Ext.Date.defaultFormat.
members.short_doc: The date format to return when using getValue. ...

members.name: fields
members.doc:
Configures field items individually. These properties override those defined by itemDefaults.

Example usage: fields: { gt: { // override fieldCfg options width: 200 } },
members.short_doc: Configures field items individually. ...

members.name: itemDefaults
members.doc:
The default configuration options for any menu items created by this filter.

Example usage:

 itemDefaults: {
     width: 150
 },
members.default: {xtype: 'menucheckitem', selectOnFocus: true, width: 125, menu: {layout: 'auto', plain: true}}
members.short_doc: The default configuration options for any menu items created by this filter. ...

members.name: maxDate
members.doc: Allowable date as passed to the Ext.DatePicker Defaults to undefined.

members.name: minDate
members.doc: Allowable date as passed to the Ext.DatePicker Defaults to undefined.

members.name: pickerDefaults
members.doc: Configuration options for the date picker associated with each field.
members.short_doc: Configuration options for the date picker associated with each field. ...

members.name: updateBuffer
members.doc: Number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction to fire an update. Only supported by filters: 'list', 'numeric', and 'string'.
members.short_doc: Number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction to fire an update. ...

members.name: active
members.doc: True if this filter is active. Use setActive() to alter after configuration. If you set a value, the filter will be actived automatically.
members.short_doc: True if this filter is active. ...

members.name: filterIdPrefix
members.doc: The prefix for id's used to track stateful Store filters.
members.short_doc: The prefix for id's used to track stateful Store filters. ...

members.name: menu
members.doc: The filter configuration menu that will be installed into the filter submenu of a column menu.

members.name: menuItems
members.doc: The items to be shown in this menu. Items are added to the menu according to their position within this array. Defaults to: menuItems : ['lt', 'gt', '-', 'eq']
members.short_doc: The items to be shown in this menu. ...

members.name: type
members.doc: The filter type. Used by the filters.Feature class when adding filters and applying state.
members.short_doc: The filter type. ...

members.name: constructor
members.short_doc: Initializes the filter given its configuration. ...

members.name: activate
members.doc: This method will be called when a column's menu trigger is clicked as well as when a filter is activated. Depending on the caller, the UI and the store will be synced.
members.short_doc:
This method will be called when a column's menu trigger is clicked as well as when a filter is
activated. ...

members.name: createMenu
members.doc: Template method that is to initialize the filter and install required menu items.
members.short_doc: Template method that is to initialize the filter and install required menu items. ...

members.name: deactivate
members.doc: This method will be called when a filter is deactivated. The UI and the store will be synced.
members.short_doc: This method will be called when a filter is deactivated. ...

members.name: destroy
members.doc: Destroys this filter by purging any event listeners, and removing any menus.
members.short_doc: Destroys this filter by purging any event listeners, and removing any menus. ...
